org.apache.ignite.ml.tree

Class DecisionTreeTrainer<T extends ImpurityMeasure<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.ml.trainers.DatasetTrainer<M,Double>
      • org.apache.ignite.ml.trainers.SingleLabelDatasetTrainer<DecisionTreeModel>
        • org.apache.ignite.ml.tree.DecisionTreeTrainer<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of impurity measure.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DecisionTreeClassificationTrainer, DecisionTreeRegressionTrainer

    public abstract class DecisionTreeTrainer<T extends ImpurityMeasure<T>>
extends SingleLabelDatasetTrainer<DecisionTreeModel>
    Distributed decision tree trainer that allows to fit trees using row-partitioned dataset.
